name: "What This Town Needs Is…"
effect: Noon: Get any Deed or Improvement from your deck or discard pile, show it to your opponents, and add it to your hand.

name: ...And Scooter Exp.
effect: Experienced. Lower Scooter's ghost rock cost and Upkeep cost by 1 when bringing him into play from your Play hand, if you have Big Jake in play. Noon: Boot Big Jake at a non-Strike Deed. Take ghost rock from the Deed's owner equal to either the Deed's Production or Jake's Influence, whichever is lower.

name: A Legal Deck
effect: Reaction: Play this card when a Joker is revealed in a draw or pull. Cancel and ace the Joker, and replace it with the top card of its player's deck.

name: A Score is Settled
effect: Ace Jim MacNeil. Discard the Sweetrock Dude(s) with the highest Bullet rating in play.

name: A Slight Cough
effect: Noon: Target a Dude. Until the end of the game, the Dude cannot move to any non-adjacent location without a card effect. Immediately before any Gambling Phase during which the Dude is at home, the Dude can boot as a Reaction to remove this effect. Ace this card.

name: A Stiff Fine
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction Pull: Play this card when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Take ghost rock from the player equal to half of the pull rounded up, up to the player's entire Vault. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Ainsley Cunningham
effect: Huckster:0

name: All Harroweds' Eve
effect: Every Harrowed Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus and +1 Influence until after Nightfall. Until after Nightfall, call-outs by Harrowed Dudes are unrefusable. Ace this card.

name: All Souls' Day
effect: Every Harrowed Dude has a -1 Bullet penalty and -1 Influence (minimums 0) until after Nightfall. Until after Nightfall, Harrowed Dudes cannot refuse call-outs and do not make the Harrowed pull when aced. Ace this card.

name: Ambition
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability "Shootout: Boot this Dude to move this Dude to the shootout's location and join your posse." Ace this card.

name: Ammo Belt
effect: This Dude's Bullet rating cannot be changed to a Draw and cannot be reduced by an opponent's Shootout action.

name: Armitage the Damned
effect: Abomination. While Armitage is in a shootout, every opposing non-Terror has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0).

name: Army of Gremlins
effect: Until after Nightfall, Gadgets do not affect play and are considered blank Goods except for their names. Every Dude with one or more of these Gadgets has -1 Influence until after Nightfall. Ace this card.

name: Assault on the Whateleys
effect: Reaction: Play this card when another player moves a Dude to your home or to a Deed you own. A Terror in your Play hand immediately enters play without cost or restriction and calls out the Dude to an unrefusable shootout. If the Terror is in play when the shootout ends, discard the Terror.

name: Attitude
effect: Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in this shootout with more than 0 Influence. The Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus and has -1 Influence until after Nightfall.

name: Austin Kills John Bloody Knife
effect: Ace John Bloody Knife. Discard the Sioux Dude(s) with the highest value in play.

name: Austin Stoker Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:1 Reaction: Boot Austin when a Spell pull is revealed. The Spell automatically fails.

name: Bakery
effect: Public.

name: Balcony
effect: Improvement. Dudes at this location can join shootouts at adjacent locations without moving or booting, even if booted.

name: Bank Draft
effect: If this Dude has an Upkeep cost over 0, lower the Upkeep cost by 1.

name: Bankrupt Morals
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play this card when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Return the player's entire Vault to the Bank. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Basement
effect: Improvement. The Basement cannot be attached to a Strike. Terrors gain +1 Influence while at this location.

name: Bedrock
effect: Improvement Bedrock can only be attached to a Strike, but you can attach it to a Strike you do not own or control. Bedrock lowers the Strike's Production to +1, and the Production cannot be increased.

name: Benjamin Dean Exp.
effect: Experienced. Whenever a Terror is aced while opposing Benjamin in a shootout, Benjamin's controller may either gain 1 ghost rock or lower the Fear level by 1.

name: Big Jake… Exp.
effect: Experienced. Lower Jake's ghost rock cost and Upkeep cost by 1 when bringing him into play from your Play hand, if you have Scooter in play. Noon: Boot Scooter at a Strike. Take ghost rock from the Strike's owner equal to either the Strike's Production or Scooter's Bullet rating, whichever is lower.

name: Black Cat
effect: Reaction Hex 6: Immediately before a Dude makes a skill pull, cast this Hex. If this Hex succeeds, the skill fails unless the Dude makes two consecutive, successful pulls.

name: Blue Jeans
effect: This Dude's Influence cannot be reduced in any way.

name: Bolt-Action Rifle
effect: Weapon. This Dude is a Stud.

name: Boom-Boom O'Bannon
effect: Noon Job Pull: Target Boom-Boom's Deed. If the job succeeds, ace the Deed. If the pull exceeds Boom-Boom's value, ace him.

name: Bounty
effect: Noon: Target a Dude. The next time a player other than the Dude's controller aces the Dude with an action or during a shootout, the player gains ghost rock equal to the ghost rock paid to play this card.

name: Bribin' the Town Council
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes with more than 1 Influence. Get any card from your deck or discard pile and add it to your hand. Discard a card from you hand. Shuffle the deck if the card you got came from it. Ace this card.

name: Bulletproof Glass
effect: Unique. Improvement. You must control a Mad Scientist to bring Bulletproof Glass into play. Your Dudes at this location cannot be called out without a card effect.

name: Cassandra
effect: Harrowed. Mystical Goods being attached to Cassandra cost 2 less ghost rock. Reaction: Immediately before bringing a Terror into play, boot Cassandra. Lower the Terror's ghost rock cost by 2.

name: Chainsaw
effect: Gadget Difficulty:4 Shootout: Ace a Goods in the opposing posse.

name: Chester Nero Exp.
effect: Experienced. Harrowed. Chester can be targeted by two copies of each Harrowed Ability card.

name: Circle K Ranch
effect: Out of Town. Public. You can bring non-Gadget cards with the Horse trait into play for 2 less ghost rock.

name: Collegium Sinks the Typhoon
effect: Noon: Target a number of Dudes at one Deed equal to the number of your ready Gadget Weapons at the Deed. Send the Dudes home booted.

name: Complaint Window
effect: Improvement. The Complaint Window can only be attached to a Government Deed. The Complaint Window lowers the Deed's Upkeep cost to 0.

name: Confusion
effect: Shootout Miracle X: Target an opposing Dude. X is the Dude's value plus Bullet rating. If this Miracle succeeds, the Dude joins your posse and you gain control of the Dude until the shootout ends.

name: Conveyor Belt
effect: Improvement. The Conveyor Belt can only be attached to a Strike. The Strike gains +1 Production.

name: Coyote's Laugh
effect: Shootout Spirit: If this Spirit succeeds, this Shaman moves to the shootout's location, ignoring movement restrictions, and joins your posse.

name: Cracked Bone Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Dance Hall
effect: Public. The Dance Hall gains +1 Production for each card in play with the Brothel trait.

name: Dead Man's Laughter Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Dead Walk the Earth
effect: All Dudes at Boot Hill go to their controllers' homes and become Abominations until after Nightfall. The Dudes have an Upkeep cost of 0 this turn. Immediately before Nightfall, all of these Dudes in play return to Boot Hill; this is not considered acing them. Ace this card.

name: Deputy John Templeton Exp.
effect: Experienced. Card effects cannot save Dudes being aced while opposing Templeton in a shootout.

name: Devil Bats
effect: Non-Unique. Abomination. Devil Bats cannot attach Goods. If at least twice as many Dudes are in the Devil Bats' posse than in the opposing posse, your hand is considered two ranks higher and the worst hand of that rank.

name: Dexter Simpson
effect: While Dexter is in a shootout, other Dudes cannot take Shootout actions printed on their cards.

name: Doctor Duvalier
effect: Huckster:2 While Doctor Duvalier is at a Strike, the Strike gains +1 Production.

name: Dominion
effect: Reaction: Play this card when a Harrowed Ability card targets a Harrowed Dude. The Harrowed Dude loses control to his or her manitou; discard the Harrowed Dude.

name: Eagle's Sight
effect: Noon Spirit 6: If this Spirit succeeds, look at any Play hand.

name: Elizabeth King Exp.
effect: Experienced. While Elizabeth is in Town Square, each of your Dudes has the ability "Noon: Send this Dude home booted."

name: Elmo Schacci
effect: Mad Scientist:0 Shootout: Once per card attached to Elmo, any Dude in Elmo's posse can attach (and make ready if it's a Weapon) a card attached to Elmo.

name: Enoch Whateley
effect: Abomination. Noon: Ace one of your non-Harrowed Dudes, Enoch gains a +1 Bullet bonus and +1 Influence until after Nightfall. Enoch can take this action twice per turn.

name: Envy Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:1 Noon: Select a Dude at Envy's location with more Goods attached than Envy. Target a Goods on the Dude that Envy can legally attach. Attach the Goods to Envy, regardless of who controls the location.

name: Eureka's Rage
effect: Noon: If this is the last card in your hand, draw cards equal to your maximum hand size.

name: Ezzie Exp.
effect: Experienced. Harrowed Harlot. Noon: Boot Ezzie. Target a Dude. The Dude's controller pulls twice: if both pulls exceed the Dude's value, ace the Dude.

name: Fineas Von Landingham Exp.
effect: Experienced. Mad Scientist:1 Noon: Move Fineas to a different location.

name: Fire and Brimstone
effect: Noon Miracle 6: If this Miracle succeeds, boot a Wanted Ddue at this or an adjacent location. If this Miracle does not succeed, discard it. This Blessed can perform this Miracle any number of times per turn.

name: Flash Flood
effect: Noon Spirit 7: Boot this Shaman. If this Spirit succeeds, then until the end of the turn, a Dude moving from a home to an adjacent location or from the Town Square to an adjacent location must boot.

name: Fleeting Memories
effect: Noon Hex 6: If this Hex succeeds, choose an action printed on a Dude in play. The Dude cannot take the action until after Nightfall.

name: Fool's Joker
effect: The Fool's Joker is only useful for pulls. If you pull it, you choose its suit and value. If you reveal it in a Draw hand, discard it, then replace it with the top card of your deck. You cannot have more than two Jokers in your deck. The Fool's Joker does not count against your deck limit.

name: Gomorra Volunteer Fire Brigade
effect: Public.

name: Good Kharma
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play this card when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Gain 4 ghost rock. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Grace
effect: Noon: Target one of your Dudes with a Bullet rating over 0. The Dude has a -1 Bullet penalty and gains +1 Influence until after Nightfall.

name: Gypsy's Tent
effect: Private. The Gypsy's Tent increases your maximum hand size by one.

name: Hard Labor
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes at one of your Deeds. Gain ghost rock equal to either the Dude's Bullet rating or the Deed's Production, whichever is lower.

name: Harvest Moon
effect: You may add a card from your lowball hand to your Play hand. If you do so, discard a card from your Play hand. Ace this card.

name: Helga's Wafflehaus
effect: Public.

name: Hitched Buggy Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Home is Where Nothin' Happens
effect: Until after Nightfall, Dudes at their homes have -1 Influence (minimum 0).

name: Hope In Winter
effect: When Hope in Winter joins a posse for a job, all other Dudes in the posse except the dealer do not boot when joining the posse or returning home from the job.

name: I Want A Raise
effect: Noon: Target a Dude with an Upkeep cost over 0. Raise the Dude's Upkeep cost by 1 until the Dude leaves play. Ace this card.

name: Inheritance
effect: Ace one of your Dudes. Get any card from your deck, show it to the other players, and add it to your Play hand. Discard a card from your Play hand. Ace this card.

name: Insurance Policy
effect: Noon: Target one of your Dudes with an Upkeep cost over 0. Raise the Upkeep cost by 1. Next time the Dude goes to Boot Hill, collect 3 ghost rock.

name: Iron Gate
effect: Improvement. Dudes must boot to move to this location.

name: Jessie Freemont Exp.
effect: Experienced. Jessie will only call out Wanted Dudes.

name: John Bloody Knife Exp.
effect: Experienced. Reaction: Immediately before Nightfall, move John to a Deed with a Terror or to a Deed you own.

name: Knicknevin
effect: When Nightfall begins this turn, all Dudes at their homes permanently lose 1 Influence (minimum 0). Ace this card.

name: Knicknevin's Deal
effect: Noon Hex X: Boot this Huckster. X is the value of a Dude in Boot Hill. If this Hex succeeds, return the Dude to play under your control, Harrowed. Ace this card.

name: Last Will
effect: Reaction: Play this card when one of your Dudes with one or more Goods is aced. Redistribute the Dude's Goods to any of your other Dudes that can attach them, even if the Dudes are booted or at locations you do not control.

name: Let's Take It Outside
effect: Shootout: Move both posses to the Town Square, ignoring movement restrictions. Continue the shootout normally in the Town Square.

name: Light of the Lord
effect: Noon Miracle 5: If this Miracle succeeds, lower one of your Dudes' Upkeep costs to 0 until after Nightfall next turn.

name: Lighthouse
effect: Out of Town. Public.

name: Locust Swarm
effect: Noon Miracle 7: If this Miracle succeeds, all Dudes at this location except this Blessed go home without booting.

name: Long Hallways
effect: Improvement. Long Hallways can only be attached to an in-town Deed. Locations two locations away from this one on your street are adjacent to this one.

name: Lord Grimely's Manor Exp.
effect: Experienced. Private. Raise the Fear level by 2 while the Manor is in play. Players other than the Manor's owner cannot gain control of the Manor or of Deeds adjacent to it. While the Fear level is 10, you have 2 additional Control Points.

name: Los Ojos Del Dios Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:1 Huckster:1 Shaman:1 Reaction: When Los Ojos fails a Spell pull, put the top card of your deck into Boot Hill (this is not considered acing it). Pull again.

name: Lukas Owens
effect: Mad Scientist:1 Weapon Gadgets being created by Lukas cost 1 less ghost rock and have -1 Difficulty until Nightfall.

name: Lumberyard
effect: Public. Improvements cost 1 less ghost rock for the Lumberyard's controller. Controller Noon: Boot the Lumberyard. Ace a card in play with "The Tree" in the title.

name: Malrog Whateley
effect: Abomination. Shootout: Boot Malrog and lower his Bullet rating to 0 until the end of the shootout. Target an opposing Dude with a lower value. The Dude cannot be the opposing posse's shooter or take actions. If the Dude is ever the only one remaining in his or her posse, ace the Dude.

name: Max Baine Exp.
effect: Experienced. Max increases the value of every other Sweetrock Dude at his location by 4 (maximum K).

name: Mental Hospital
effect: Public. Government. Spells cannot target Dudes at the Mental Hospital.

name: Meredith Singleton Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:1 While in a shootout, Meredith decreases the value of every opposing Terror by 5 (minimum 1).

name: Mines Reopen
effect: Reaction: Play this card immediately before the Gambling Phase draw. Play lowball inversely (high hand wins) this turn.

name: Mirror, Mirror
effect: Noon Hex 6: If this Hex succeeds, this Huckster copies the Influence or Bullet rating of a Dude at this or an adjacent location, until after Nightfall.

name: Miss Lily
effect: Blessed:2

name: Miss Me?
effect: Noon Pull: If the Fear level is over 6, target one of your Dudes in Boot Hill. If the pull is less than the Dude's value, return the Dude to your hand. The next time a copy of the Dude enters play, the Dude permanently gains the Harrowed trait.

name: Muddy Brown Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: My Fight's With You
effect: Shootout: If this shootout is not for a job, send home booted all Dudes in this shootout except the dealer and the target. Other Dudes cannot join either posse.

name: Mystical Bag
effect: Mystical. Mystical Goods being attached to this Dude from your Play hand cost 3 less ghost rock.

name: Nemesis
effect: Shootout: Choose one of your Dudes in this shootout. Target an opposing Dude. After the shootout, whenever these two Dudes oppose each other in a shootout, your Dude gains a +3 Bullet bonus and becomes a Stud.

name: Nightmare Realm
effect: Noon Hex X: X is the Fear level. If this Hex succeeds, raise the Fear level by 1 until the end of the turn and discard this Hex.

name: Ninth Circle Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: No-Tell Hotel
effect: Public. Brothel. Saloon.

name: Observatory
effect: Private. Controller Reaction: When a pull is revealed, boot the Observatory. The pulling player discards the pull and replaces it with the top card of his or her deck.

name: Pale Horse
effect: Unique. Abomination. Mystical Horse. Noon: Move this Dude to another location. Shootout: Move this Dude into the current shootout, ignoring movement restrictions.

name: Paper Money
effect: Reaction: Play this card when another player is about to take 1 or more ghost rock from your Vault. The player cannot take the ghost rock.

name: Penny Arcade
effect: Private.

name: Pocket Watch
effect: Gadget Difficulty:4 Reaction: When High Noon begins, boot the Pocket Watch. Take a Noon action before the Winner's first Noon action.

name: Poison Woman
effect: Abomination. Huckster:1 All Studs become Draws during a shootout with the Poison Woman.

name: Polecat Saloon
effect: Public. Saloon. Every non-Wanted Dude at the Polecat Saloon has -2 Influence (minimum 1).

name: Puny Mortals!
effect: Reaction: Play this card after a pull succeeds for a skill Difficulty over 6. The skilled Dude permanently gains +1 Influence. Ace this card.

name: Quarantine
effect: Until after Nightfall, Dudes in town cannot move to out-of-town locations, and vice versa. Ace this card.

name: Quick Reload
effect: Reaction: Play this card after you take an action printed on a Goods. You can use the action a second time this turn.

name: Radar
effect: Gadget Difficulty:7 Reaction: Immediately after a Dude moves, boot the RADAR. Move this Dude to the same location.

name: Raven Smiles
effect: Shaman:1

name: Relic
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Select a Weapon attached to the Dude. While it remains in play, the Weapon gains an additional +2 Bullet bonus. Ace this card.

name: Renovations
effect: Reaction: Play this card immediately before bringing an in-town Deed into play. Target one of your in-town Deeds. Discard the targeted Deed. Bring the new Deed into play at the old Deed's location. The new Deed's ghost rock cost is reduced by the old Deed's printed ghost rock cost. Dudes who were at the old Deed remain at the new Deed.

name: Reserve Judgement Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Rope Bridge
effect: Improvement. The Rope Bridge can only be attached to a Strike. Opponents' card effects cannot send home or remove from the shootout Dudes in a shootout at this location.

name: Rough and Tumble Saloon
effect: Public. Saloon. Determine control of the Rough and Tumble Saloon by Bullet rating instead of Influence.

name: Runnin' Water
effect: Improvement. Runnin' Water's Deed has the ability "Controller Noon: Boot this Deed. Unboot a Dude at this location."

name: Sammy Childs
effect: Reaction: Immediately after Gambling Phase Draw hands are revealed, boot Sammy. Target any non-Event card revealed by another player. Discard the card and replace it with the top card of the player's deck. The player's new hand is not considered cheating, regardless of its contents.

name: Sandra Harris Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: Boot Sandra. Look at the top two cards of any deck.

name: Saul Whateley Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:1 Every Terror at Saul's location has +1 Influence for the purpose of controlling the location, as well as a +1 Bullet bonus.

name: Sea of Sorrows Mine
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Second Story
effect: Improvement. The Second Story can only be attached to an in-town Deed worth at least 1 Control Point.

name: Shark's Grin Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Sheriff's Shaft
effect: Private. Strike. Ownership of the Sheriff's Shaft cannot change due to a card effect.

name: Shootin' Range
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Choose one of your Dudes at this location and a Weapon attached to the Dude. Until the end of the game, while the Dude has the Weapon ready, he or she gains a +1 Bullet bonus. You can only take this action once per Weapon.

name: Sin Eater
effect: Abomination. The Sin Eater cannot attach Goods. Reaction: When a Dude aced at the Sin Eater's location goes to Boot Hill, the Sin Eater gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

name: Snow In July
effect: Noon Miracle 8: Boot this Blessed. If this Miracle succeeds, then until the end of the turn, a Dude moving from a home to an adjacent location of from Town Square to an adjacent location must boot.

name: Soul In A Bottle
effect: Noon Hex X: Boot this Huckster. Target a Dude at this Huckster's location. X is the Dude's value. If this Hex succeeds, turn the Dude face-down; the Dude is out of play (except for uniqueness) until after Nightfall this turn.

name: Speaking With the Dead
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability "Noon: Choose an action printed on a Dude in Boot Hill. This Dude is considered to have that action printed on his or her card until after Nightfall." Ace this card.

name: Squish-Eye Samantha
effect: Shootout: Move any Maze Rat into your posse. Samantha can take this action in the shootout, at the shootout's location, or at a location adjacent to the shootout.

name: Strangers Among Us
effect: Every Dude who enters play this turn has -1 Influence (minimum 0) until after Nightfall.

name: Strike Experiment #2
effect: Private. Strike. You may boot any number of your Mad Scientist Dudes when you bring the Strike Experiment #2 into play. The Strike Experiment's Production equals the number of Dudes you booted.

name: Sun Shu-Jen Exp.
effect: Experienced. Sun Shu-Jen will not attach Weapons. Shootout: Shu-Jen gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout for each Huckster in the shootout.

name: SUZY 309 Exp.
effect: Experienced. Gadget Dude. Gadget Difficulty:8 SUZY cannot begin the game in play. To bring SUZY into play, pull as if SUZY were a Gadget being created by one of your Mad Scientists. SUZY enters play at the Mad Scientist's location. When one of your Mad Scientists creates a Gadget, you may attach the Gadget to SUZY instead of to the Mad Scientist.

name: Suzy Goes Berserk
effect: Shootout Hex X: If the opposing posse has more than one Dude, boot this Huckster. Target a Dude in the posse. X is the Dude's value plus Bullet rating plus Influence. If this Hex succeeds, the Dude comes under your control and begins a shootout against the rest of his or her posse. The new shootout ends after one round; control of the Dude returns to the other player, and the original shootout resumes.

name: Tailor
effect: Public.

name: Teamwork
effect: Reaction: Play this card immediately before a skill pull is made when you have another, unbooted Dude at the same location and with the same skill as the skilled Dude. Add the second Dude's skill rating to the acting Dude's for the pull.

name: The Ammo-Matic
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:5 Shootout: Once per shootout round, give the Ammo-matic a +1 Bullet bonus until the shootout ends.

name: The Coalition
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:21 The Coalition is both Agency and Texas Rangers. Increase your maximum hand size by one. While you have Agency and Texas Rangers Dudes in the same posse, each of your Dudes in the posse has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0). While you have Agency and Texas Rangers Dudes in play, The Coalition gains +1 Production.

name: The Evidence
effect: Noon: Discard The Evidence. Target a Wanted Dude in play. The Dude becomes non-Wanted. Noon: Ace The Evidence and pay 2 ghost rock. Target a non-Wanted Dude in play. The Dude becomes Wanted.

name: The Flock- Children Of Armageddon
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:18 Noon: Ace one of your Wanted Dudes. Get any card from your deck or discard pile and add it to your hand. Shuffle the deck if the card came from it.

name: The Gate is Opened
effect: Starting with you and going clockwise, players may boot as many of their Hucksters as they wish. If the combined skill rating of all of the Hucksters exceeds 8, each player that booted at least one Huckster gains 2 Victory Points. This Event does not resolve if another copy of it has already resolved this game. Ace this card and the booting Huckster(s) with the lowest value.

name: The Horse Doctor
effect: Private. The Slaughterhouse gains +1 Production while The Horse Doctor is in play. Controller Reaction: Boot The Horse Doctor when a non-Gadget card with the Horse trait is aced. Put the Horse into its owner's hand instead of into Boot Hill.

name: The Jinx
effect: Blessed:0 All Stud Dudes are Draws while at The Jinx's location.

name: The Madman's Secret
effect: Each Dude in play with the highest value permanently becomes an Abomination. For each of the Dudes who was not already a Terror, the Dude's controller gains 1 Victory Point. Ace this card.

name: The Taskmaster
effect: Blessed:0 Noon: Boot The Taskmaster. Target a Dude at The Taskmaster's location. Permanently lower The Taskmaster's and the Dude's values by 2. If either Dude's value falls under 1, ace that Dude.

name: The Whateleys- Extended Family
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Each of your Terrors has its Upkeep cost lowered by 1 (minimum 0). You always have additional Control Points equal to the Fear level minus 6.

name: Timmy Derrick
effect: Only Terrors can call out Timmy. Timmy has no ghost rock cost if you control The Orphanage.

name: Tool Belt
effect: Reaction: When bringing a Deed into play, boot this Dude. Gain 2 ghost rock, which you may use to pay for the Deed.

name: Trick Deck
effect: Shootout: Your opponent must draw and show you his or her hand before you draw. Your first revealed Draw hand is automatically considered illegal.

name: Tricky Spirits
effect: Reaction: Play this card immediately before a skill pull is made. Increase the skill's Difficulty by 3.

name: Tzipporah Whateley
effect: Huckster:1

name: U.S. Army Enlistment Office
effect: Public. Government. Controller Noon: For each Dude at the Enlistment Office, pull: If the pull is a club, discard the Dude (the Dude is sent off to war). If the pull is an ace of clubs, ace the Dude instead.

name: Vampire Ambush
effect: Target a location you control that contains one or more Abominations. Each non-Terror Dude at the location pulls: if the pull value exceeds the Dude's value minus the number of Abominations at the location, discard the Dude. Ace this card.

name: Vampiric Dance Hall Girl Exp.
effect: Experienced. Abomination. For each Dude aced at the Dance Hall Girl's location, the Dance Hall Girl gains either a +1 Bullet bonus or +1 Influence, your choice, until after Nightfall. Noon: Target a Dude at the Dance Hall Girl's location with a value lower than the Dance Hall Girl's Bullet rating plus Influence. Send the Dude home booted.

name: Vermin Problem
effect: Noon: Boot your Outfit card. Target a Deed. Every Maze Rat at the Deed gains a +1 Bullet bonus and +1 Influence for each other Maze Rat at the Deed. Such a bonus goes away if its Dude leaves the Deed, and all such bonuses go away after Nightfall. The Influence increase does not count toward your total Influence during Nightfall. Ace this card.

name: Victor Navarro Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: Move Victor to a location with no Dudes.

name: Voice O' the Damned
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability "Reaction: When another Dude at this Dude's location with over 0 Influence is aced, this Dude gains +1 Influence until the end of the turn. This Dude can take this action once for each aced Dude." Ace this card.

name: Walkin' Stick
effect: Noon: Move this Dude to an adjacent location.

name: War of Words
effect: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes to call out another Dude at the same location to an unrefusable shootout. During the shootout, all Dudes have their Bullet ratings replaced by their Influence, and all bonuses and penalties to Bullet ratings apply to Influence. Dudes aced in this shootout leave the shootout but remain at the shootout's location. The winning posse controls this location until after Nightfall, regardless of Influence totals.

name: War Party
effect: Noon Spirit 6: Each of your Dudes at this Shaman's location gains a +1 Bullet bonus until after Nightfall. Shootout Spirit 8: Each of your Dudes in this posse gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the shootout ends.

name: Water Tower
effect: Private.

name: Weapons Locker
effect: Improvement. Dudes at this location can have more than one ready Weapon. If Dudes leave this location or the Locker leaves play, each Dude with more than one ready Weapon must choose a single ready Weapon.

name: Welcome To Hell
effect: Noon Miracle 7: If this Miracle succeeds, target a Wanted Dude in play. Move this Blessed to the Dude's location. The Blessed calls out the Dude to an unrefusable shootout. If the Dude is aced during the shootout, gain 1 Victory Point.

name: What Have You Done Lately?
effect: Noon: During Nightfall this turn, players do not count Victory Points when checking the victory condition.

name: Whateley Family Bible
effect: Unique. Mystical. The Whateley Family Bible has no ghost rock cost if being attached to Wilhelmina Whateley. Terrors at this Dude's location (including this Dude if he or she is a Terror) have a +1 Bullet bonus, +1 Influence, and a +1 to each skill.

name: Wilhelmina Whateley Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:3 Lower each of your Terrors' Upkeep costs by 1 (minimum 0). Shootout: Ace one of your Dudes. Target an opposing Dude with a Bullet rating less than that of the Dude you aced. Ace the target Dude.

name: Wise Cloud Exp.
effect: Experienced. Shaman:3

name: Wither
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability "Noon: Boot this Dude. Target a Dude in this or an adjacent location. The target Dude's controller pulls three times: if all three pulls exceed the target Dude's value, ace the target Dude." Ace this card.

name: Worse'n I Thought
effect: Reaction: Play this card when a Dude being aced is no longer aced due to a card effect. Cancel the effect and ace the Dude normally.

name: Wrath Exp.
effect: Experienced. Shootout: All opposing Dudes are considered to have blank text boxes until after the shootout ends.

name: Zapper
effect: Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:5 Shootout: Target an opposing Dude. The Dude cannot be his or her posse's shooter if another Dude can, and the Dude does not contribute the one-card Draw or Stud bonus to the shooter.
